hooks.name: gk/multiple-forms/loaded
hooks.description: Triggers an action when the plugin is fully loaded.

hooks.name: gform_gf_query_sql
hooks.description: Filter the SQL query fragments to allow low-level advanced analysis and modification before the query is run.

parameters.name: sql
parameters.description: An array with all the SQL fragments: select, from, join, where, order, paginate.

hooks.name: gk/multiple-forms/query/handler/join/conditions
hooks.description: Modifies conditions for a joined form query.

hooks.name: gravityview_multiple_forms/allow_join_on
hooks.description: Filters the allowed non field join data value.

parameters.name: allowed_non_field_join_data
parameters.description: Meta keys and entry property names. entry_id is an alias for id
